Hi Simon,

It's great connecting with you!

I represent an outstaffing company Remote Helpers.
We provide our clients all over the world with remote employees. We would like to offer you our candidates for hire who are available to work in the following positions: Developers(Back-End, Front-End, Full-Stack, QA Testers), Lead Generation Managers, Customer Support, Personal Assistants, Social Media Managers, Designers, Media Buyers, PPC, SEO, AdOps, English teachers, etc.

We can set a call to see if we can find a fit for you and of course explain our model if you are interested.

name: Charlotte (Berndt) Melchert
note: компанія, що створила маркетплейс, де організатори маратонів та інших забігів на витривалість можуть викладати інформацію про себе, а атлети, відповідно, можуть замовити на цій платформі квитки. Сама платформа називається World's Marathons. Нещодавно ми відкрили схожу платформу, але для велопробігів — World's Cycling

lead_id.note: компанія, що створила маркетплейс, де організатори маратонів та інших забігів на витривалість можуть викладати інформацію про себе, а атлети, відповідно, можуть замовити на цій платформі квитки. Сама платформа називається World's Marathons. Нещодавно ми відкрили схожу платформу, але для велопробігів — World's Cycling

client_accounting_note.note:
15.06.23
Діяльність компанії - компанія, що створила маркетплейс, де організатори маратонів та інших забігів на витривалість можуть викладати інформацію про себе, а атлети, відповідно, можуть замовити на цій платформі квитки. Сама платформа називається World's Marathons. Нещодавно ми відкрили схожу платформу, але для велопробігів — World's Cycling. Їхні продукти "Ahotu is the world’s most comprehensive racing calendar providing athletes from all over the world with information about more than 70,000 endurance races globally. The calendar contains many different formats such as running events, triathlons, and cycling races. It also provides organisers with tools to promote their events. Each month hundreds of thousands of athletes visit the website to discover events.World’s Marathons is the go-to place for running enthusiasts looking to discover new and exciting challenges across the world. At World's Marathons our priority is our athletes, and our goal is to deliver a great experience throughout your journey - from researching the right challenge, to registering, securely paying, and of course, event participation.RaceOffice™ is an organiser’s gateway to listing and selling tickets for their events on the World’s Marathons marketplaces and the Ahotu racing calendar. Additionally, RaceOffice™ offers an enhanced, easy-to-use registration system with order and participant management. It’s the perfect solution for organisers who want complete control over their event whilst providing participants a smooth journey from browsing new events to crossing the finish line." Пошта: тільки переписка щодо оплати та зарплати. Оплата 2-3 тижні.

name: Max Goldshtein
note:
RESULT

Company Name: Sowillo Energy

 
Company Website: http://www.sowillo.com/

Contact Person: Kirill Dedul

Product: Sowillo Energy is a technological utility company focusing on hot water managing and heat optimization for shared multiuser systems with green energy being primary source of energy. A prominent example of such systems is high-rise residential buildings. Sowillo develops easy-to-install IoT devices, which convert any type of thermosolar systems to intelligent ones. Sowillo Energy reduces the cost of living by providing cheap hot water in a clean way and saves the maintenance costs by taking off the system maintenance headache from users.

Country-Location: Israel

Specialties: Solar energy, Renewable Energy, Energy Savings, Home Improvement, IoT, Energy Efficiency, and Thermal EnergyTarget 

Audience: worldwide 

Immediate Requirement: Kirill needs a content manager (preferably with technical education or some technical process understanding) to fill his e-store, maybe create an Instagram account and promote it (they also have Fb account, but don’t actually use it). Now Kirill want to promote their services by blogers.  He also needs a person who will search investors for his company (preferably + content in one person). We also propose to hire a video editor to create some videos about their product.

Next Step: Send information about our company, send some CVs of suitable candidates and an example of service agreement.
